00059 cache_content_caching_type_t cache_content_cache_behaviour( cache_entry_t               * pentry_inode,
00060                                                             cache_content_policy_data_t * ppolicy_data,
00061                                                             cache_content_client_t      * pclient,
00062                                                             cache_content_status_t      * pstatus ) 
00063 {
00064   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_FULLY_CACHED ;
00065  
00066   if( pentry_inode->internal_md.type != REGULAR_FILE ) 
00067    {
00068       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00069       return *pstatus ;
00070    }
00071  
00072   if( ppolicy_data->UseMaxCacheSize ) 
00073    {
00074      if( pentry_inode->object.file.attributes.filesize > ppolicy_data->MaxCacheSize )
00075        *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_TOO_LARGE_FOR_CACHE ;
00076    }
00077 
00078   return *pstatus ;
00079 } /* cache_content_cache_behaviour */
